about.title: About us...
about.description: At Rentarica, we are dedicated to helping you explore the best vacation destinations in the Dominican Republic. Whether you are looking to buy a property, rent a property or invest in real estate, our team of experts is here to guide you every step of the way. We pride ourselves on providing personalized service to ensure that all of our clients have a memorable and enjoyable experience. You can trust that your properties are in good hands with Rentarica, allowing you to relax and enjoy the benefits of your real estate investment. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you achieve your real estate goals in the Dominican Republic.

message_form.title: Leave us a message
message_form.name: Name
message_form.event_info: Would you like info about any fair or event?

register_property.title: Sell or Rent Your Property: Start Here!
register_property.intro: As part of our effort to optimize and streamline this process, we have developed a form to help you gather crucial information more efficiently.
register_property.instructions: Within each classification are our services that we offer. When filling out the form, be sure to choose the right one depending on whether it's for sale or short-term rental.
register_property.cta: Each button leads you to the right form to complete, depending on the type of property and what you want to do with it.

additional_info.text: If you have any questions, need assistance, or don’t have some information on hand, don’t hesitate to leave the form. We’ll get in touch with you and help you complete it along the way.
additional_info.closing: We are here to help you every step of the way.

upcoming_fairs.title: Upcoming Real Estate Fairs
upcoming_fairs.description: We invite you to join us for an enjoyable moment while we showcase the great investment opportunities in this country. Choose your destination and register:

event.note: Location to be announced. If you’re interested, please register and we’ll keep you informed once we have all the details.
